parkingRobot

Class INavigation.ParkingSlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • parkingRobot.INavigation.ParkingSlot
  • Enclosing interface:
    INavigation

    public static class INavigation.ParkingSlot
extends Object
    contains all necessary information about one parking slot. This is the slot status (whether it is/is not satisfying or has to be scanned again), its ID, the position of the slot begin front boundary and the position of the slot back boundary.
    Author:
    IfA

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  INavigation.ParkingSlot.ParkingSlotStatus
      states the parking slot can be in

    • Constructor Detail

      • INavigation.ParkingSlot

        public INavigation.ParkingSlot(int ID,
                       Point backBoundaryPosition,
                       Point frontBoundaryPosition,
                       INavigation.ParkingSlot.ParkingSlotStatus slotStatus)
        generate a ParkingSlot object and initialize all data members.
        Parameters:
        ID - stores the parking slot ID that is the number of recent detected parking spaces incremented by one
        backBoundaryPosition - position of parking slot back boundary, robot passes it first then the front boundary
        frontBoundaryPosition - position of parking slot front boundary, robot passes it second after the back boundary
        slotStatus - characterization of the parking slot measurement
